questions.question: 1. On which of the following graphs topological sort can be applied  ?

explanations.a:
“Every Directed Acyclic Graph has one or more topological ordering whereas Cyclic and Undirected graphs can’t be ordered topologically”
Every Directed Acyclic Graph has one or more topological ordering.
explanations.b: Undirected Acyclic Graphs cannot be sorted topologically as the order of the nodes in the graph is not definite as the edges are bidirectional.
explanations.c: In a cyclic graph, topological sort is not applicable as the cycle disturbs the order of the nodes.
explanations.d: In a cyclic graph, topological sort is not applicable as the cycle disturbs the order of the nodes.
